name: Harm Denial
description: Expel Harm's healing is increased by <dynamic>20% - 35%</dynamic>.

name: Inner Fury
description: Fists of Fury's damage is increased by <dynamic>20% - 35%</dynamic>.

name: Calculated Strikes
description: Spinning Crane Kick's bonus from striking a unique target with Tiger Palm, Blackout Kick, or Rising Sun Kick is increased by an additional <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic>.

name: Coordinated Offensive
description: When Storm, Earth, and Fire spirits fixate on the same target, they deal <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic> additional damage.

name: Xuen's Bond
description: Abilities that activate Combo Strikes reduce the cooldown of Invoke Xuen, the White Tiger by 0.5 sec, and Xuen's damage is increased by <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic>.

name: Grounding Breath
description: When casting Vivify on yourself, its heal is increased by <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic>, and it has a chance to refund its cost.

name: Jade Bond
description: Abilities that activate Gust of Mist reduce the cooldown on Invoke Yul'on, the Jade Serpent by 0.5 sec, and Yu'lon's Celestial Breath healing is increased by <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic>.

name: Resplendent Mist
description: Gust of Mists has a 30% chance to do <dynamic>25% - 40%</dynamic> more healing.

name: Fortifying Ingredients
description: Fortifying Brew grants you a shield equal to <dynamic>5% - 20%</dynamic> of your health for 15 sec.

name: Lingering Numbness
description: When Paralysis ends, your target's movement speed is reduced by <dynamic>60% - 90%</dynamic> for 5 sec.

name: Dizzying Tumble
description: Targets affected by your Leg Sweep deal <dynamic>5% - 20%</dynamic> less damage for 5 sec.

name: Swift Transference
description: Transcendence: Transfer increases your movement speed by <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic>.

name: Tumbling Technique
description: Blackout Kick has a <dynamic>5% - 20%</dynamic> chance to grant a charge of Roll.

name: Rising Sun Revival
description: Rising Sun Kick reduces the remaining cooldown on Revival by 1 sec, and Revival heals targets for <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic> of Revival's heal over 10 sec.

name: Scalding Brew
description: Keg Smash deals an additional <dynamic>20% - 50%</dynamic> damage to targets affected by Breath of Fire.

name: Celestial Effervescence
description: While under the effects of Celestial Brew, your effects that heal you are increased by <dynamic>20% - 35%</dynamic>.

name: Nourishing Chi
description: Life Cocoon increases healing over time received by an additional <dynamic>15% - 30%</dynamic>, and this bonus lingers for an additional 6 sec after the shield is broken.

name: Evasive Stride
description: Shuffle grants your Stagger <dynamic>5% - 20%</dynamic> additional effectiveness.

name: Walk with the Ox
description: Abilities that grant Shuffle reduce the cooldown on Invoke Niuzao, the Black Ox by 0.5 sec, and Niuzao's Stomp deals an additional <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic> damage.

name: Strike with Clarity
description: Weapons of Order's duration is increased by 5 sec, and the Mastery bonus is increased by <dynamic>5% - 20%</dynamic>.

name: Bone Marrow Hops
description: Bonedust Brew's Shadow damage or healing is increased by <dynamic>20% - 50%</dynamic>, and when Bonedust Brew deals Shadow damage or healing, it reduces its cooldown by 0.5 sec.

name: Imbued Reflections
description: Fallen Order monks deal <dynamic>20% - 50%</dynamic> more damage and healing.

name: Way of the Fae
description: Faeline Stomp deals <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic> additional damage per target, up to a maximum of <dynamic>50%</dynamic> additional damage.
